summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the Improvement of W. Garfield St. from 31st Ave. W. to 28th Ave. W.; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system; all in accordance with Resolution No. 25825 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a Local Improvement District therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said District Payable by the Mode of Payment by Bonds.
